meanings.sent1: The witness misdescribed the suspect's appearance to the police.
meanings.sent2: She misdescribed the movie plot to her friend.
meanings.sent3: The comedian misdescribed his own height for a joke.
meanings.sent4: The map misdescribed the location of the hidden treasure.
meanings.sent5: The student misdescribed the scientific process in her presentation.

meanings.sent1: The misdescribed product was returned to the store.
meanings.sent2: The misdescribed painting was sold at a discounted price.
meanings.sent3: The misdescribed cake turned out to be a funny mishap at the party.
meanings.sent4: His misdescribed personality was like a puzzle to his friends.
meanings.sent5: The misdescribed book cover misled many readers.
